answers.answer: During the glucose test they have you drink a concentrated sugar drink. Not soda. There are different flavors of the drink but the one I got was orange flavor.
No they didn't make you drink pop.  Its a juice but to me it taste like a watered down pop. They will make you take it sometime between 24-28 weeks
The drink they give you is a really sugary orange drink that taste like it went flat. Its not bad

question: Are they really going to make me drink cocacola ?? I mean Ive never drank soda I find it extremely grose.. but besides that how many weeks untill I do that ? And is it easy ??
title: diabetes test
